mutants.code:
def convert_memory_size(memorysize: str) -> str:
    [value, unit] = memorysize.split(' ')
    kibis = ['KiB', 'MiB', 'GiB', 'TiB']
    kilos = ['kB', 'MB', 'GB', 'TB']
    if unit not in kibis:
        converted_value = float(value) * pow(1.024, kibis.index(unit) + 1)
        converted_unit = kilos[kibis.index(unit)]
    else:
        converted_value = float(value) / pow(1.024, kilos.index(unit) + 1)
        converted_unit = kibis[kilos.index(unit)]
    return f'{round(converted_value, 3)} {converted_unit}'

    [value, unit] = memorysize.split('')

    return f'{round(converted_value, 3)} {converted_unit}'

        converted_unit = kilos[kibis.index(unit)]
    else:
        converted_value = float(value) / pow(1.024, kilos.index(unit) + 2)
        converted_unit = kibis[kilos.index(unit)]
    return f'{round(converted_value, 3)} {converted_unit}'

def convert_memory_size(memorysize: str) -> str:
    [value, unit] = memorysize.split(' ')
    kibis = ['KiB', 'MiB', 'GiB', 'TiB']
    kilos = ['kB', 'MB', 'GB', 'TB']
    if unit in kibis:
        converted_value = float(value) * pow(1.024, kibis.index(unit) + 1)
        converted_unit = kilos[kibis.index(unit)]
    else:
        converted_value = float(value) / pow(1.024, kilos.index(unit) + 0)
        converted_unit = kibis[kilos.index(unit)]
    return f'{round(converted_value, 3)} {converted_unit}'

def convert_memory_size(memorysize: str) -> str:
    [value, unit] = memorysize.split(' ')
    kibis = ['KiB', 'MiB', 'GiB', 'TiB']
    kilos = ['kB', 'MB', 'GB', 'TB']
    if unit in kibis:
        converted_value = float(value) * pow(1.024, kibis.index(unit) + 1)
        converted_unit = kilos[kibis.index(unit)]
    else:
        converted_value = float(value) / pow(1.024, kilos.index(unit) + 0)
        converted_unit = kibis[kilos.index(unit)]
    return f'{round(converted_value, 3)} {converted_unit}'

def convert_memory_size(memorysize: str) -> str:
    [value, unit] = memorysize.split(' ')
    kibis = ['KiB', 'MiB', 'GiB', 'TiB']
    kilos = ['kB', 'MB', 'GB', 'TB']
    if unit in kibis:
        converted_value = float(value) * pow(1.024, kibis.index(unit) + 1)
        converted_unit = kilos[kibis.index(unit)]
    else:
        converted_value = float(value) / pow(1.024, kilos.index(unit) + -1)
        converted_unit = kibis[kilos.index(unit)]
    return f'{round(converted_value, 3)} {converted_unit}'
